page.title: 14A Construction Co-Dorking NE
page.content: Near the station there is the{Head {Office}of a construction company called Biwater Shellabear.We saw Mr. White,the chairman.He said that the company built sewage works,reservoirs, water filtration plant and pipe lines. The main contracts have been carried out in{Africa}and the Middle East. The office was built in Dorking in { {1975}because it was near{Gatwick and {Heathrow Airport}and close to{London.} There are enlarged photographs of their projects in the{Reception {Hall,}which is rather warm,but the receptionist was efficient.Inside it is modern with leather sofas and electrically operated curtains. It is{highly computerised}and a{Telex {System}makes overseas comunications quick and easy. { A hot drink vending machine}had taken over from the tea lady.
